trans-unit.source: Implements a cryptographic Random Number Generator (RNG) using the implementation provided by the cryptographic service provider (CSP).
trans-unit.target: 使用由密碼編譯服務供應者 (CSP) 提供的實作 (implementation)，實作密碼編譯亂數產生器 (RNG)。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此類型會實作<xref:System.IDisposable>介面。

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節<xref:System.IDisposable>介面 > 主題。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a random number with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立具有一個隨機數字<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider>類別。

trans-unit.source: This type is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 此型別具備執行緒安全。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a random number with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立具有一個隨機數字<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider>類別。

trans-unit.source: A byte array.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: This value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 這個值會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This method does not directly initialize the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會直接初始化<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider>類別。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider.%23ctor%28System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters%29?title=RNGCryptoServiceProvider(CspParameters)> constructor and passing `null`.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法相當於呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider.%23ctor%28System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters%29?title=RNGCryptoServiceProvider(CspParameters)>建構函式，並傳遞`null`。

trans-unit.source: The parameters to pass to the cryptographic service provider (CSP).
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞給密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP) 的參數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider" /> class with the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的參數，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The string input.
trans-unit.target: 字串輸入。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數已忽略。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This method does not directly initialize the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會直接初始化<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider>類別。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider.%23ctor%28System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters%29?title=RNGCryptoServiceProvider(CspParameters)> constructor and passing `null`.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法相當於呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider.%23ctor%28System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters%29?title=RNGCryptoServiceProvider(CspParameters)>建構函式，並傳遞`null`。

trans-unit.source: The array to fill with a cryptographically strong sequence of random values.
trans-unit.target: 要填入在密碼編譯方面的強式隨機值序列之陣列。

trans-unit.source: Fills an array of bytes with a cryptographically strong sequence of random values.
trans-unit.target: 在位元組陣列中填入在密碼編譯方面的強式隨機值序列。

trans-unit.source: The length of the byte array determines how many cryptographically strong random bytes are produced.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列的長度將決定要產生多少的密碼編譯強式隨機位元組。

trans-unit.source: This method is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是安全執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a random number with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立具有一個隨機數字<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider>類別。

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic service provider (CSP) cannot be acquired.
trans-unit.target: 無法取得密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="data" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="data" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The array to fill with a cryptographically strong sequence of random nonzero values.
trans-unit.target: 要填入在密碼編譯方面強式的隨機非零值序列之陣列。

trans-unit.source: Fills an array of bytes with a cryptographically strong sequence of random nonzero values.
trans-unit.target: 在位元組陣列中填入在密碼編譯方面的強式隨機非零值序列。

trans-unit.source: The length of the byte array determines how many cryptographically strong random nonzero bytes are produced.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列的長度將決定所產生的密碼編譯強式隨機非零位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a random sequence of 100 nonzero bytes and stores it in `random`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立隨機 100 則為非零的位元組序列，並將其儲存在`random`。

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic service provider (CSP) cannot be acquired.
trans-unit.target: 無法取得密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="data" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="data" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。
